thread.title: New 'Star Wars' trailer to debut during 'Monday Night Football'
thread.title_full: New 'Star Wars' trailer to debut during 'Monday Night Football'

title: New 'Star Wars' trailer to debut during 'Monday Night Football'
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest New 'Star Wars' trailer to debut during 'Monday Night Football' After the trailer launch tickets will officially go on sale for The Force Awakens, as well as for a seven-movie marathon event that will show every single Star Wars film at theaters around the country. Post to Facebook New 'Star Wars' trailer to debut during 'Monday Night Football' After the trailer launch tickets will officially go on sale for The Force Awakens, as well as for a seven-movie marathon event that will show every single Star Wars film at theaters around the country.  //on.kthv.com/1RSqpcP   Join the Conversation To   New 'Star Wars' trailer to debut during 'Monday Night Football' Kelly Lawler, USA TODAY 1:49 p.m. CDT October 19, 2015 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens' poster. (Photo: Lucasfilm) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
After the trailer launch tickets will officially go on sale for The Force Awakens, as well as for a seven-movie marathon event that will show every single Star Wars film at theaters around the country. 
Lucasfilm announced the new trailer while premiering a new poster Sunday, which gave fans their first peek at Carrie Fisher's return as Princess Leia and a new mystery to mull over in the form of a large, circular space station that looks an awful lot like a Death Star. Crews working to contain fire in Landmark area of Pulaski Co. 
So far two full-length trailers for the highly-anticipated film have hit the airwaves. The first was released over Thanksgiving weekend in 2014, and the second at the Star Wars Celebration convention in April of this year. Both were met with approval from the franchise's very-dedicated fanbase. You can watch the second trailer below: Read or Share this story: http://on.kthv.com/1RSqpcP More Stories
